schema.name: 02/06/2019 Beef sukiyaki Carrot Noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the carrots by washing them thoroughly. Use a spiralizer to create carrot noodles.
Thinly slice the red onion and dice the garlic.
Trim the green beans and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
In a large pan, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and red onion, sautéing until fragrant and translucent, about 3 minutes.
Add the sukiyaki beef to the pan and cook until browned on all sides, approximately 5 minutes.

Incorporate the green beans and carrot noodles into the pan, seasoning with salt, pepper, marjoram, thyme, and oregano. Cook for an additional 7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.

schema.description: This Beef Sukiyaki with Carrot Noodles recipe is a high-protein, low-carb dish that transforms traditional indulgence into a healthified masterpiece. Perfect for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing flavor, this dish marries the rich taste of sukiyaki beef with the freshness of carrot noodles and a bouquet of herbs.
